text: @HillaryClinton Many people and doctors and nurses are criticizing Moon government  severally, which at first Moon government didn't ban sending mask to China so many Korean people and volunteers couldn't buy mask for  coronavirus. Major companies, Samsung and Hyundai..donated medical goods.
